thing-type.label: Blaster
thing-type.description: This is an infrared transmitter that can send infrared commands

parameter.name: led
parameter.label: Led
parameter.description: The Led on which infrared commands will be emitted

parameter.name: remote
parameter.label: Remote
parameter.description: The remote or manufacturer name which's commands will be allowed, as defined in the IRtrans server database and flashed into the transceiver. Can be '*' for any remote

parameter.name: command
parameter.label: Command
parameter.description: The name of the command will be allowed, as defined in the IRtrans server database and flashed into the transceiver. Can be '*' for any command

channel-type.label: Input/Output
channel-type.description: Read commands received by the blaster, or write commands to be sent by the blaster
